optionsLvl3.label: The size of the Investor's financial instrument portfolio, defined as including cash deposits and financial instruments, exceeds EUR 500,000.

The investor, or a person authorised to transact business in the Investor's name, has worked in the financial sector for at least one year in a professional position, which requires knowledge of the transactions or services envisaged.

The Investor, or a person authorised to transact business in the Investor's name, has carried out transactions, in significant size, on the relevant market at an average frequency of 10 per quarter over the previous four quarters.

answerOptions.label: The Investor subscribes for a Capital Commitment of at least EUR 200,000.

According to the EU Directive on „key information documents for packaged retail and insurance-based investment products (PRIIPs)“ you have to be provided with a key information document (KID) about the fund. The KID serves to inform you on the potential risk and costs associated with an investment in the fund. You can find the KID in the Accompanying Documents). You have the right to request a paper copy of the KID free of charge. Please contact the Fund management, if you wish to request a paper copy of the KID. A copy of the KID is also available on our website, as further indicated in the digital KID form. (Deutsche Übersetzung / German translation)
